We are leaders in logistics
solutions and imports

Solutions by air, land and sea

The Business Group Berlin Baqueira has positioned itself as leader in logistics solutions and imports of raw materials in Venezuela. Our portfolio of products compromises corrugated cardboard, PET packaging, polypropyleneand chemicals,among others.

The Business Group s proactive in different lines of business, with a logistics and financial arm that allows it to becompetitive on solutions by air, land and sea in Venezuela and internationally.

Our Pillars

Mission

We develop and execute the best solutions for the logisticsand financial challenges of the Venezuelan business community

Vision

To be theleading Company in the developmentof solutions for the most emblematicand beloved brands by Venezuelans

Values

Honesty
Consistency
Efficiency

Our Companies

Berlin Consulting

Company specialized in supply chain logistic and financial consultancy

• Strategic Ally to Empacor, S.A. (Colombia) for the development and expansion of the corrugated cardboard category
• Operation with vertical integration (development and/or homologation, production, import, storage and on-site delivery)

Inversiones
Baqueria Beirit

Company specialized in import and distribution of packaging material (PET and bags of polypropylene and fique) and pellets of polypropylene

• Strategic Ally for Esenttia (Colombia) for coverage and distribution of polypropylene in Venezuela
• Strategic Ally to Microplast SAS (Colombia) for solutions in PET packaging in Venezuela

Inversiones Quimiveco

Company specialized in import and distribution of a broad array of chemical products

• Approved permits for import, storage and distribution of restricted chemicals in Venezuela(Regime4and 7)
• Conditioned storage deposit for the appropriate handling of restricted chemicals, compliant with international standards

Business Model

The Client requests raw material quote, referring us to the supplier or requesting development

Upon reception of raw material quote, a “Cost Structure” is developed in local currency (BsS)

The Client checks the Cost Structure in the corresponding departments:
• Management
• Finance
• Auditing

The Client approves the operation and the Company executes

The Company imports and delivers on-site

The Client pays once goods are received on-site in local currency (BsS) at exchange rate of the time

Key Data

+125

Successful operations within this business model frame

+15

Commercial allies in Europe, Asia and America

Clients & Suppliers

Smart Manufacturing

In order to improve efficiency and minimize exposure to non-programmed stops of factories, weaudit productionlines inorder to plan preventive maintenance and manage inventoriesof sensitiveand consumablespare parts.

Through this initiative we seek to maximize the capital return of our Clients’ long-term assets, by identifying potentialcontingencies beforethey materialize.
